name: Fill The Void
description:
There is a VOID in your soul after a tragedy. Try to fill it up.

Game made for MiniJam 62: Void. And I think because of small amount of words it is more like a concept then full game.

Best played with headphones.

Instructions: write words to fill up the void - like "dog", "beer" etc. Some words will decrease VOID and some will increase. The distribution of words are not based on any studies or research.

Font: Sad Kropotkin Laugh by Bumbayo Font Fabrik Music: Call of the Void by Mega Pixel Music Lab
Palette: NEON SPACE PALETTE Created by Jimison3

Words you can use are :

"friend", "pet", "music", "dance", "talk", "fun", "game", "bike", "walk", "drug", "drugs", "vodka", "beer", "drink", "anarchy", "tv", "gamble", "hazard"
